name: file_comment_edited
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A file comment was edited  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					files:read 				 The file_comment_edited event is sent when a file comment is edited. It is sent to all connected clients for users who can see the file. Clients can use this notification to update comments in real-time for open files. The file property is a file object.
